name: Stairs Jump Ball - Funny Race
description:
Launch the ball from stair to stair up to the top of the stairway! Jump and bounce, do your best and reach the highest score! Keep an eye out for traps and numerous obstacles and you’ll be rewarded! You can unlock a wide range of different balls: from generic red or green ones to glowing slimy balls or even mossy stone ones.

Stairs Jump Ball - Funny Race features:
• Several unlockable locations to jump on
• Unusual obstacles to overcome
• Skill training possibilities and difficult challenge levels
• Collectible bonuses to speed up your progress
• Realistic bouncing ball physics

Download this Stairs Jump Ball - Funny Race game and become the master of hopping and jumping! Start with easy steps and train your skills to maximum capacity!
